requestParams.name: refunds
requestParams.desc: 退款详情，多种支付方式退款则是个list

children.name: refund_mode
children.desc: 退款方式：0:"原路退回",1:"现金",2:"其它"

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

print client.invoke('youzan.mei.order.refund', '1.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
